reviewText: So often these kinds of things are just horrible, but these weren't.  Couple of them were very enjoyable.  One was definitely male fantasy which is often the case.  These are more like film studies done by students.  But quality of recording, light, sound and acting were all better than average.  Overall enjoyable.
Title: Sexual Tension: Violetas

reviewText: A good mix, long movie overall made up of series of shorts. **So sorry to the guys who thought there was not enough SEX in this film for them... try PORN.** This film is actually a cute set of foreign lesbian shorts; some well-written, with good to fair acting. Some skits quite hot! A few of them were so good they should've been made into an entire movie to finish the story!
summary: A Foreign Lesbian Film of Shorts
